EmailTemplate.description: 6th Contact Attempt approx. 5-7 days after 5th Contact Attempt
EmailTemplate.name: No contact 6th Attempt
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we could not connect, here is some important information for you.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I know that there are several different potential reasons why I haven’t heard from you these past couple of weeks but I’m hoping that one more attempt will do the trick! If not, I wanted to ensure that you’re aware that even without participating in our Enterprise Onboarding Process, you are still entitled to these great benefits with you QuickBooks Enterprise Subscription!
U.S.–Based Customer Support: Get your questions answered fast with exclusive access to our U.S.-based team of QuickBooks technical and product experts. Our team of dedicated experts are thoroughly trained in QuickBooks Enterprise to provide support during or after installation, answer your technical questions, or help troubleshoot. They can also help you get the most out of QuickBooks Enterprise by helping you tailor it to fit your business needs. Your Full Service Plan does not limit the number of calls you can make to our U.S.-based expert support team. Call them if you need them at 1-866-340-7237.
Product Upgrades: You'll automatically receive new versions of our products when they're released, along with updates to your current version to make sure you're always up-to-date with the latest features and enhancements.
Online Backup: Protect your Enterprise file and any other business data with QuickBooks-integrated online data backup and restoration service. Your data is stored in a protected and encrypted format at two separate locations so you can easily retrieve it whenever you need it.
Data Recovery: We can help protect against problems you might encounter with your QuickBooks data, recover data if your hard disk crashes, and reset lost or forgotten passwords.
Everything Enterprise: With your exclusive access to Everything Enterprise, our member website, you will be able to download QuickBooks Enterprise updates and upgrades, view product training videos, and access all the benefits of your Full Service Plan - all in one place.
Training Tools: To help you and your employees make the most out of QuickBooks Enterprise complimentary access to Mastering Intuit QuickBooks Enterprise, an interactive training program, is provided.
Preferred Rates on QuickBooks Payments: You may qualify for preferred rates on QuickBooks Payments with your QuickBooks Enterprise subscription.
Thank you again for your time and I hope to hear from you soon,
Chadwick Farrell ~ Account Manager Intuit ~ Simplify the business of life Work Phone: 800-498-7401 ext 1447
This transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
